evidence.claim: Medical Billing Wholesalers utilizes AWS cloud services for its infrastructure.
The company complies with HIPAA regulations to ensure secure handling of medical billing data.
Medical Billing Wholesalers supports X12 standards for electronic data interchange.
The integration of FHIR APIs is part of their health data management solutions.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on healthcare billing suggests usage of X12 transactions for claims and remittance.
